conbody.p: The Resource transformer (ResourceT) plays a vital role in proper resource management in the conduit project. I have no yet released conduit, but consider this the first post in a series describing conduit and how to use it. For the impatient, you can see the Github repo, which has a fairly comprehensive README file. Note that the code is not final, and API changes are expected before release.
This post is devoted to explaining ResourceT as its own entity. While some of the design decisions clearly are biased towards conduits, ResourceT should remain a usable tool in its own right.
